originalText.text: Egzon came out to repair my plumbing. He set up my kitchen faucet, dishwasher, and refrigerator with an ice maker. He completely replaced all of the pipes behind the wall. E & E Mechanical Services Inc. was recommended by a friend who uses them on a regular basis for plumbing repair, and all I can say is that they are wonderful, hardworking, and make sure the work is done correctly.

text.text: Egzon came out to repair my plumbing. He set up my kitchen faucet, dishwasher, and refrigerator with an ice maker. He completely replaced all of the pipes behind the wall. originalText.text:
I’m a super for 3 buildings in Nyc midtown west area. I Hired Exon to come in and work on plumbing issues and repairs in all 3 of my buildings. And I must say that. In the timely manner he repaired the issues. The quality of work he performed on the repairs. And the costs of the repairs were everything I expected them to be. I highly recommend him to anyone that is looking for a plumber that provides quality plumbing work that’s cost effective….

Thanks Exon,
Rob A. ( Superintendent in Nyc )

originalText.text: Excellent service. Very efficient and competitive pricing. Did a complete piping installation for a washer & dryer (including vent exhaust, complete new water lines, and new drain pipe). A complex project as it was in an existing construction but Egzon (the owner) made sure the work was done with minimal damage. Place was spotless once the work was complete. Highly recommend!

text.text: Excellent service. Very efficient and competitive pricing. Did a complete piping installation for a washer & dryer (including vent exhaust, complete new water lines, and new drain pipe). A complex project as it was in an existing construction but Egzon (the owner) made sure the work was done with minimal damage. Place was spotless once the work was complete. Highly recommend!

originalText.text:
Excellent plumbing company. A+
School had a several time sensitive plumbing related issues. Company response was speedy and efficient. Owner Egzon did the work himself to highest satisfaction with minimal disruptions. Trustworthy, jobs are well organized, and the work area was left clean. Highly Recommended.

text.text:
Excellent plumbing company. A+
School had a several time sensitive plumbing related issues. Company response was speedy and efficient. Owner Egzon did the work himself to highest satisfaction with minimal disruptions. Trustworthy, jobs are well organized, and the work area was left clean. Highly Recommended.

originalText.text:
I had a problem at my house with the toilet to the point where my tub was floating and sink, it was really disgusting to say the least. I called E & E Mechanical services and they came within an hour. They knew what the problem was right away, fixed everything. Egzon also checked my pipes and fixed literally everything what had to be fixed. I am so grateful for this company because if they wouldn't help me, then my entire basement would have been floated.
Not only that I also had a problem in the kitchen with kitchen faucet it ket getting stuck, they also fixed that. And honestly for the amount of work they did, they didn't charged me a lot. I am glad I was able to get in contact with them and I will recommend them to all my friends and family because they are amazing at what they do.
